DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Glucose-dependent Insulinotropic Polypeptide (GIP) or Glucagon Like Peptide 2 (GLP-2) has an affect on the secretion of Glucagon from the pancreas in patients with type 1 diabetes mellitus.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of GIP and GLP-2 on the Secretion of Glucagon in Patients With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Caucasians over 18 years with type 1 diabetes (WHO criteria) Arginine test without rise in plasma Cpeptide Normal blood Hemoglobin Informed consent Liver disease Diabetic nephropathy Treatment with medications unpausable for 12 hours
